text: aur (un ke liye) jo un ke baadh aaye, jo kahenge ke aye hamaare parvardigaar hamein baqsh de aur hamaare un bhaiyyo ko bhi jo hum se pehle imaan laa chuke hai aur imaan waalo ke liye hamaare dil mein kina (aur dushmani) na daal, aye hamaare rab beshak tu shafaqqath wa meherbaani karne waala hai
